"Artillery Automata":
"Spardan A? Dude, those guys are a piece of cake!
I see through every move they've got! The real
challenge now is that other machine. You know, that
pain-in-the-ass automata they call a Spargan? That
thing is serious trouble, dude. No, I really mean it! It
kind of looks like a Spardan A, so I was hanging back
to see what it was up to. That's when it suddenly
started unloading on me! I bet even you'd freak out
if it happened to you. Go on. Show me what you can
do!"

"スパルダンＡ？　ああ、あんなのザコザコ！
動きなんてとっくに見切ってるって！
それより今度はあいつだよあいつ！
スパルガン、とかいうふざけた機甲種！
あいつ本気でやばいって、マジマジ！
なんかスパルダンＡに似てるから
距離取って様子見てたら、いきなり
銃とかぶっぱなしてきやがったんだぜ！
おたくもびびっちまうだろうから、一度
戦ってみたら？　オレ、見ててやるからよ！"
